## isBindingAddress() function

Type guard for binding address

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isBindingAddress(bindingSelector: BindingSelector): bindingSelector is BindingAddress;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  bindingSelector | <code>BindingSelector</code> | Binding key or filter function |

<b>Returns:</b>
